content: hook and starting in the lower right hand corner join scarlett with slip_stitch and slip_stitch in the end of each row until you reach the top chain 4 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet *chain 3 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet repeat from * across then slip_stitch down the left side in the end of each row finish off for small pockets set three aside for the right side of your needle roll and three for the left side for the right side pockets starting at the top with f hook join sage with slip_stitch in the first single_crochet *chain 3 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet repeat from * across then slip_stitch down the left side in the end of each row finish off repeat for the remaining right side pockets for the left side pockets starting at the bottom right hand corner with f hook join sage with slip_stitch and slip_stitch in the end of each row until you reach the top chain 4 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet *chain 3 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet repeat from * across finish off repeat for the the cover using the safety pins stitch markers or otherwise pin the big pocket to the cover by matching up the first stitch of the big pocket with the 14th st of the cover pin through those two stitches then match up the last stitch of the big pocket with the 54th st of the cover pin through those two stitches now pin the small pockets along the sides of the cover starting with the top pockets of each side first since each lower pocket will slightly overlap the higher one each pocket should be pinned at the following measurements top pockets at 5 and 8 ½ middle pockets at 2 ½ and 6 bottom pockets at bottom corner and 3 ½ round 1 with f hook and sage and with outside of cover facing you join with single_crochet in any corner st single_crochet twice more in the same st then single_crochet in each single_crochet around with 3 single_crochet in each corner st making sure to go through all thicknesses through the cover and pockets where they are joined removing the safety pins as you come to them join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet made finish off round 2 with f hook and tan join
